instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
In a medium bowl, mix together the ground beef, onion, egg, bread crumbs, and bacon bits. Season with garlic salt. (I like to use a lot.) Divide into four balls, and pat into patties.

Lightly oil the grate, and place patties onto the grill. Cook for about 5 minutes per side, or until firm and no longer pink in the center. Serve on toasted buns with your favorite hamburger toppings.
title: Lea's Hamburgers
sentences: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
In a medium bowl, mix together the ground beef, onion, egg, bread crumbs, and bacon bits.
Divide into four balls, and pat into patties.
Lightly oil the grate, and place patties onto the grill.
Cook for about 5 minutes per side, or until firm and no longer pink in the center.
Serve on toasted buns with your favorite hamburger toppings.
